text: All the Young Men is a 1960 American Korean War movie directed by Hall Bartlett and starring Alan Ladd, Sidney Poitier, James Darren, Glenn Corbett, Mort Sahl, Maria Tsien, Lee Kinsolving, Paul Baxley, Charles Quinlivan. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1960 war movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies directed by Hall Bartlett Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies about race and ethnicity Category:Movies about racism Category:Movies set in Montana Category:Movies set in the 1950s
title: All the Young Men
